languages.text: "Я содрогаюсь от омерзения при одной только мысли, что придется коснуться одежды с нечестивыми символами, и тем более — облачиться в нее! Это — первый шаг к падению, маленькое смирение со злом, которое приведет к большому. Неужели нет иного пути, Вольный Торговец?"

"I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: "Я содрогаюсь от омерзения при одной только мысли, что придется коснуться одежды с нечестивыми символами, и тем более — облачиться в нее! Это — первый шаг к падению, маленькое смирение со злом, которое приведет к большому. Неужели нет иного пути, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch garments with unholy symbols, let alone put on them! This is the first step to a fall, a small resignation to evil that will lead to a big one. Is there no other way, Rogue Trader?"

"I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step towards falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

"I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step towards falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

"I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

"I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

languages.text: "Mich schaudert bei dem bloßen Gedanken, Stoff zu berühren, der mit unheiligen Symbolen verziert ist. Geschweige denn, ihn zu tragen! Das ist der erste Schritt zum Untergang, ein kleiner Kompromiss mit dem Bösen, der zu etwas Größerem führen wird. Gibt es wirklich keinen anderen Weg, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Mich schaudert bei dem bloßen Gedanken, Stoff zu berühren, der mit unheiligen Symbolen verziert ist. Geschweige denn, ihn zu tragen! Das ist der erste Schritt zum Untergang, ein kleiner Kompromiss mit dem Bösen, der zu etwas Größerem führen wird. Gibt es wirklich keinen anderen Weg, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"

languages.text: « La seule idée d'avoir à toucher des vêtements ornés de symboles impies me dégoûte au plus haut point... alors les porter, vous imaginez ! C'est le premier pas avant la chute, un compromis avec le mal qui ne peut qu'entraîner quelque chose de bien pire. N'y a-t-il vraiment aucun autre moyen ? »
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: « La seule idée d'avoir à toucher des vêtements ornés de symboles impies me dégoûte au plus haut point... alors les porter, vous imaginez ! C'est le premier pas avant la chute, un compromis avec le mal qui ne peut qu'entraîner quelque chose de bien pire. N'y a-t-il vraiment aucun autre moyen ? »

languages.text: “一想到要接触那些带着邪恶印记的衣服，我就恶心得浑身发抖，更不用说穿上它了！向邪恶妥协一小步，就是走向堕落的第一步，之后只会在堕落的道路上越走越远。真的没有其他办法了吗，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: “一想到要接触那些带着邪恶印记的衣服，我就恶心得浑身发抖，更不用说穿上它了！向邪恶妥协一小步，就是走向堕落的第一步，之后只会在堕落的道路上越走越远。真的没有其他办法了吗，行商浪人？”

languages.text: 「不浄のシンボルの入った服に触れると考えるだけで虫唾が走るのに、ましてソレを着るなんて！転落の第一歩だが、これ以上悪い方向に行きかねない悪魔とのささやかな妥協でもある。本当に他の方法はないのか、自由開拓者殿？」
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: 「不浄のシンボルの入った服に触れると考えるだけで虫唾が走るのに、ましてソレを着るなんて！転落の第一歩だが、これ以上悪い方向に行きかねない悪魔とのささやかな妥協でもある。本当に他の方法はないのか、自由開拓者殿？」

languages.text: «¡Me da escalofríos la mera idea de tener que tocar ropa adornada con símbolos impíos, y no digamos ponérmela! Este es el primer paso hacia la caída, un pequeño compromiso con el mal que conducirá a algo mayor. ¿De verdad no hay otra manera, Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Me da escalofríos la mera idea de tener que tocar ropa adornada con símbolos impíos, y no digamos ponérmela! Este es el primer paso hacia la caída, un pequeño compromiso con el mal que conducirá a algo mayor. ¿De verdad no hay otra manera, Comerciante Independiente?».

languages.text: "Habis sembollerle bezenmiş bir kıyafete dokunma fikri bile midemi bulandırıyor. Bir de giyecek miyim? Demedi demeyin, böyle böyle yoldan saparız. Mühim değilmiş gibi dursa da şere teslimiyetin bedeli çok ağır olacaktır. Hür Tacir, hakikaten başka yol yok mu?"
languages.original_text: "I shudder with disgust at the mere thought of having to touch clothing adorned with unholy symbols, let alone wear it! This is the first step toward falling, a small compromise with evil that will lead to something greater. Is there truly no other way, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Habis sembollerle bezenmiş bir kıyafete dokunma fikri bile midemi bulandırıyor. Bir de giyecek miyim? Böyle böyle yolumuzdan sapacağız. Mühim değilmiş gibi dursa da şerle uzlaşmanın bedeli çok ağır olacaktır. Hür Tacir, hakikaten başka yol yok mu?"
